notes.text: You can now use ReadOnly and Mandatory as FieldControl annotations for multi-input fields
You can now add print and export options to the Share menu
We now correctly handle paginator buttons when navigation is triggered
Weâ€™ve resolved an issue with the cut and copy enablement logic when multiple rows were selected
We now ensure that variant selection works correctly in tables with multiple views defined with different entity sets
You can now configure the threshold for the number of rows initially loaded in a table
You can now freeze columns in the Column Settings dialog and disable column freezing by using the disableColumnFreeze parameter
You can now attach event handlers to the list binding of tables and retrieve the row count.
We now ensure that quick views can be opened from fields with criticality
We now correctly display the date by setting its type to medium, preventing conversion to short format
